quest.name: The Merchant of Komra
journal: The dour dwarf is raring to do his part to help the cause─and for this he needs your help.
objectives: Obtain exotic paraphernalia in the Puppets' Bunker.
Deliver the exotic paraphernalia to the dour dwarf.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: I appreciate you letting me join you...and apologize for my earlier rudeness. Not to make an excuse, but it's been a trying time for us all.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Now, I've been pondering the ways in which I might contribute to the rebuilding effort. While I don't have many talents─not outside of those considered normal for a dwarf such as drinking, at any rate─people do say that I have the gift of the gab.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Using this gift, I've a mind to peddle wares in the outside world to earn coin to put towards our work. There's just one problem: at the moment, we don't have anything that would fetch a halfway decent price.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: No, we need something more unusual and exotic than our grog and automata. And as I racked my beard for ideas, it came to me: what could be more unusual and exotic than objects from another world?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: The machines have a base inside the crater, and I understand it's brimming with all manner of their paraphernalia. Such items are guaranteed to fetch a high price─we just need someone to venture in to retrieve them: you!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If you're not fussed about what I bring back...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm not sure if they'd be worth that much...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: As long as it's unusual, I'm confident I can spin a sales pitch for it. Oh yes, the coinbags of Eulmore would trip over themselves for such rare curios.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: So just bring back the items, and leave the rest to me. Our coffers will be full before you know it!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: How fares the search in the crater? Remember, I'm not fussed about what you bring back as long as it's unusual.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Back from the crater, are you? Come, come, show me what you were able to find.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Oho, strange and wondrous items, all! I'll examine everything closely before I attempt to peddle them, but these ought to be snapped up with nary a fuss.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: My thanks for bringing these. Now I can do my little part for our village.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Ah, and before I forget, the chief was asking for you earlier. If you have a moment, do go and see what he wants.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: The chief has been asking for you. If you have a moment, do go and see what he wants.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Ah, I was wondering when you would come by again.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: The items you brought back last time are perfect, but I'm hoping to have more stock before I head to Eulmore to do my peddling.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Could I trouble you to go on another foray into the crater?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: With just a few more items from the crater, I'll have enough stock to make it worth setting out to do my peddling. My thanks in advance.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: There you are. Were you able to find anything else of interest?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Marvelous! With the addition of this little lot, I'm now ready to set forth!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: If truth be told, I'm a little daunted by the prospect of going all the way to Eulmore. But if I have confidence in myself─and some grog is always good for that─I'm sure that all will be well.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Oh yes, I'll see to it our wares fetch the best coin they can, and prove to everyone that I'm worth more than the ale I can hold.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: Thanks for all your help, my friend. I'll be fine from here, and you can let the chief know as much.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERD03954
dialogue.text: To be deleted.
